dt-button.name: searchPanesClear
dt-button.summary: A single button that clears the SearchPanes selections.
dt-button.description: This button clears all of the SearchPanes options that have been selected, resetting the search that is applied.
dt-button.option: This options allows the text within the button to be configured.
The action function for the SearchPanesClear button calls the `-api searchPanes.clearSelections()` method.
